definition: abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items

sentences.english: This rule nullifies the "little brother" argument.
sentences.chinese: 这条规则否定的“小兄弟”的论点。

sentences.english: Do some critical thinking and write your thesis statement down in one sentence.
sentences.chinese: 做一些批判性的思考，并用一句话陈述出你的论点。

sentences.english: Okay what is the argument word in this one?
sentences.chinese: 好，这里什么是论点的标志词呢？

sentences.english: The advocates of tele-education give their arguments as follows.
sentences.chinese: 远程教育的倡导者给出了他们的论点如下。

sentences.english: This is a very weak inductive argument.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个很弱的归纳论点。

sentences.english: If you remember we looked at deductive arguments sound.
sentences.chinese: 如果你记得我们看演绎论点的完好。

sentences.english: Will you reject the counterargument and explain why it is mistaken?
sentences.chinese: 你能够驳斥相反的论点并说明为什么它是错误的吗？

sentences.english: Fallows's main argument, though, was psychological.
sentences.chinese: 但是，法洛斯的主要论点是心理上的。

sentences.english: Be sure to footnote both argument and evidentiary citations.
sentences.chinese: 务必要记得，在引用不同论点和证据时，要加上。

sentences.english: He quoted some old Chinese sayings to illustrate his points.
sentences.chinese: 他援用了一些中国话来解释他的论点。

sentences.english: See if you can do that for the other argument?
sentences.chinese: 看看你们能不能在另外一个论点上做？

sentences.english: My contention is that financial markets tend towards these strange attractors not to equilibrium.
sentences.chinese: 我的论点是金融市场趋向这些奇怪的引资者不平衡。

sentences.english: It is a correct argument that Huayingshan fault zone is a fundamental fault.
sentences.chinese: 推断华蓥山断裂带系基底断裂的论点是正确的。

sentences.english: However you have evaded my argument.
sentences.chinese: 然而你绕过了我的论点。

sentences.english: Okay now lets look at deductive argument first.
sentences.chinese: 好现在我们首先来看看演绎论点。

definition: to prove a point/to expound on/to demonstrate or prove (through argument)/proof
reductio ad absurdum/arguing by contradiction/also called 反證法|反证法
to refute/to demolish (an argument, theory etc)
circular argument/logical error consisting of begging the question/Latin: petitio principii
conclusion/verdict/CL:個|个[ge4]/to conclude/to reach a verdict
